website_summaries.verdict: A renowned silhouette has been revamped to deliver a sturdier skate shoe. The DC Court Graffik SE featured almost the same elements of the original Graffik but modernized with heavy-duty materials and details for the contemporary consumers.The brand loaded this model with high-class comfort and support that suits the board use. While some griped about the insufficient arch support and poor board feel, many users still recommended this for its exceptional durability on and off the board with style and spunk.
pros: A large number of the reviewers admired the timeless style of the DC Court Graffik SE
Available in wide range of colorways
This shoe is found at a budget-friendly price point
For some skaters, the Court Graffik SE has an excellent cushioning that delivers superb support
This pair runs true to size
Thrashers cited explicitly about this shoe's sturdy outsole and the superb ground traction apt for the hardcore tricks
Many observed the high-quality materials used in this sneaker
This footwear has been highly recommended by most reviewers
Many wide-footed wearers liked the comfortable fit of DC Court Graffik SE on their feet
Some users liked this so much that they bought another pair as their alternative shoe
Some happily shared that they received compliments from friends and strangers while wearing this eye-catching footwear
cons: Some users criticized the insufficient arch support of the DC Court Graffik SE
Few complained that it took them a while to break in this pair
A handful of disappointed buyers did not like the chunky tongue
Quite a few Thrashers lashed the poor board feel of this kick

customer_reviews.title: Beware discounted variations.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well and are comfortable. The left shoe is misshapen around the stitching near the bottom of the laces on the right side. Both DC emblems fell off after wearing them twice. Stitching around the sole was frayed upon delivery and is already comming loose. There's excess rubber all over the peice around the base of the leather on both shoes. Edit: bought a second pair with blue court graffik. These have a different leather grain, much more pronounced than the previous pair. This pair appears to be stitched correctly and no excess rubber. However, this pair was full price @ $70. Where the previous pair was $49.99.
customer_reviews.author: Robert hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny I paid for them!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I don’t think these are the same DC shoes You pay a lot more for in the stores. They seem a little bit more cheaply made and just not right. HOWEVER this is not the first pair I bought from here and the others held together just fine so I’m not gonna complain about them especially for the price I paid for them compared to regular stores. I’ve seen other people’s posts that they fall apart quick etc but mine seem fine. I’m also 38 and don’t skateboard or run around beating the crap out of my shoes like when I was younger, maybe that’s why they last me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Lance

customer_reviews.title: These brought me back and were super comfy. They're very "poofy" when you first get ...
customer_reviews.text: I missed the old school skater shoes I used to wear when I was in high school. These brought me back and were super comfy. They're very "poofy" when you first get them unlike a lot of the older skater brands (Airwalks, Vans) nowadays that have changed to a thinner, less poofy style. I will say that if you're not used to the "overstuffed" shoes, you may want to go up a size so the tongue isn't putting pressure on the top of your foot. Also, the laces seem a bit short and difficult to tie, but that goes along with the poofiness, I think. Still, they're very comfy, well-made shoes.
customer_reviews.author: shadedhue

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, if uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been complimented on these shoes sooooo many times, while out and about. Unfortunately they are pretty uncomfortable. I have had 4 surgeries on my left foot, which don't help. My toes are usually throbbing after about 3 hours, and the ball of my foot is swollen, as well. Would I buy them again? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cudmore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: First day that I wore them (I work lifts at a ski/mountain biking resort), I had 7 customers and 3 lifties compliment me on them. They are super comfortable right out of the box. They look and feel like every other DC item I have (snowboard boots, gloves, shirts, jacket) and that's a good thing. My leather gloves are 7 years old, so I expect to have these for a while. The uppers are super-soft and well-padded. The soles are grippy and you can feel what's underfoot without being annoyed. TOTALLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: robb

customer_reviews.title: Not the dc we once knew
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but they just dont last like they used to. And I'm way less active now than I was 7-10 years ago...I buy one pair a year now. Used to be a pair lasted 2 or 3 years. That again I have not seen their prices go up over the years Perhaps the company should raise prices and make better quality As other companies have done so over the years
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: First off an amazon issue. The box was so damaged in transit it had to be repackaged. But apparently they came out of the box onto the ground as they were already dirty and slightly stained with dirt(they are all white so it’s pretty obvious) second these are either knockoffs or something like that. I own like 5 pairs of these exact shoes and this particular pair feels cheap and they are nowhere near as comfortable as my other 5 pairs. Overall very unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Shoes worked I havent done a review for so long cause I forgot but you have me two different shoes but I needed shoes so it didnt bother me at the time I have a 4inch lift on the left shoe. As you can see the tongues are completely different but it's still a dc shoe
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: These didn't fit like the 3 other pairs of Graffik that i have size 9.5
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pair of the Graffik shoes- all are size 9.5 and fit great. Bought these in 9 5 expecting they would fit no differently than the other pairs i have but was surprised when i tried em on. I like the shoe, just had to return/exchange them for 1/2 a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Morse

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but tight.
customer_reviews.text: I do love the shoes, however make sure you get a bigger size than you are use to. And if you don’t like really tight shoes then don’t get these. I’ve had them for a month or so and they haven’t lost the “tight” feeling yet. I normally wear a size 8 and I had to get a size 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Anthony

customer_reviews.title: BEST LOOKING SHOES I'VE EVER OWNED!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking shoes. Fits EXACTLY as expected and I must say these are the most beautiful looking shoes I have ever owned and I have owned A LOT of shoes. No shipping damage and came in very good time especially for the current times with the covid-19 and backed up orders! Couldn't be happier, if you are remotely interested in these I say BUY NOW! Very very comfortable and to be honest they are so nice I am afraid to even wear them! 5 Stars all around..would buy them over and over again ..great price!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia Powell

customer_reviews.title: This model of DCs are very tough long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I learned my lesson buying other shoes once in a while with hit and miss results. But this DC model is tough! Usually wear them for a year then rotate them into work shoes doing drywall and mud for a year or two. Last pair to hit the trash I wore the soles off took over 3 years and they were still in one piece. Other DC models I've had some issues. Adidas similar shoe model lasted like 3 months and soles separated from the shoe total waste of money. Soles are sewn on these and the leather doesn't scuff easy. (DC Court Grafik SE Skate Shoe) BEST shoe I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: sheetrockskull

customer_reviews.title: Was a 5 🌟
customer_reviews.text: I was going to put a 5 star till today. A huge chunk of the bottom shoe came out.... I bought these things only 4 months ago! And I just wear them for work. No crazy sports. I'm an office jocky. I expect better for the price. Looks like I need to go back to converts, At least I got over a year with them! So annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband & he just loves them. The last pair lasted over 30 years & although they still held up the surface just couldn't be cleaned anymore. Now, he's decided he'll get two more different pairs. So, if anyone is looking for an excellent shoe that lasts forever, then DC is the brand you want.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these shoes. I wear men’s DCs since they don’t really make very nice women’s ones an the men’s are more roomy an comphy in my opinion. I wear size 11 in W an size 10 in M. So they fit well an are a little loose like I like em. Only thing is they will wear down pretty fast. I feel DC quality just isn’t what it used to be back in the day. But it’s still a pretty good shoe for 65$
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I buy court graphic DC’s because they always fit the same, every time. I have a wide foot and these shoes fit real good almost like they are made for my feet. Couldn’t be happier. Would buy them again. And I often do. I own about 25 pair in different colors and styles of course. I even wear them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian James

customer_reviews.title: as thats the part that looked the worst..
customer_reviews.text: didnt noticed until later on when by chance the sun hit my shoes before i put them on from the inside you see the light of the sun going through the shoe... never seen that before especially on my other shoes... guess the shoe must be made out of cheaper material or something guess if tears from where the thread is ... as thats the part that looked the worst... well know if it is cheap material
customer_reviews.author: David DEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe! Fit Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: After reading plenty of reviews, which scarred me from purchasing the shoes, I can happily say that the pair of DC's I purchased fit perfectly. They came brand new with no scuffs and seem well put together. It looks like every other DC's I have purchased and aside from being a little stiff when first worn, I have no issues with them. I used the size from the DC's I had been wearing to buy these ones and they fit the same. I can't wait for them to wear out so I can buy a new pair! *DISCLAIMER: I use DC's as everyday shoes, not for skating! If you are looking for that then my review may not be applicable.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban N

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this particular DC shoe in about 10 different color/styles -- they are fantastic. They fit well, the laces stay securely tight (some laces are cheap/terrible -- these are not) and they look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Why is the tongue so big??
customer_reviews.text: After some searching and thought, I settled on these shoes, so I was bummed when I had to return them. The fit is ok (little tight in the toes but they'll break in) but the tongue on these is huuuuge. So big that it made them uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: robert m.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Yeah super happy I made this order. The shoes are nice. I ordered a a half a size larger due to reviews and glad I did, they fit perfect. Insole is a little stiffer but wally world had insoles 😎. If you're doing what I did and debated if buying shoes online is a good idea, these were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: But living in a small town they're impossible to find and it's not always easy for us to make the 3+ hour drive to ...
customer_reviews.text: My family is a DC brand family! My boys and husband both have multiple shirts each as well as socks, shoes etc. But living in a small town they're impossible to find and it's not always easy for us to make the 3+ hour drive to the closest big city. I was a little hesitant to buy online since my husband wouldn't be able to try them on but I just bought the same size I usually do. They shipped fast, came in secure packaging, and fit perfect! I will definitely be buying DC's on Amazon from now on. DC Shoes have superb quality and hold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Neese

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has gotten very light use (maybe 4 hours of walking/week) since I bought it 2 months ago, yet the bottom has broken (see pic). I haven't bought DC shoes in a few years but thought I try them again. Not only are they not very comfortable but the quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine but this was purchased as a gift and the shoe box looks like it was run over and crushed. The shoe box is ripped at every corner. Embarrassing to give as a gift. Maybe because they stuck it in an envelope.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, though comfortable, not as good as running shoes...but definitely more durable, which is what i wanted in the first place. I wash my shoes in the washing machine when they need it and was looking for a sewn on sole for that. I should go get some shoe inserts to make these better for heel striking as I have a back issue. Good shoes though! Update: after some wear in , it seems the stock insole was squished out and I had to buy some 'gellin' ones to put on top, and also a 3/4 insert on top of that for my back . Ok shoe just not as good for working in.
customer_reviews.author: The Derb

customer_reviews.title: Decals pealing within 3 weeks of purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked DC shoes. These shoes are super comfortable. However, I recently purchased a new pair of shoes through Amazon. I have only been wearing the shoes for about 3 weeks and the DC emblems on top of the toes are already peeling off to the point that they are barely hanging on the shoe. VERY disappointing. Quality control is a huge concern of mine now days. This is a good example of a product that barely makes it off the shelf without having an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lee Bast

customer_reviews.title: DC skate shoe girl
customer_reviews.text: I love DC skate shoes. Was glad to get this pair in a mens 7 for such a great price. I'm a female and did worry about the size fitting properly, but they fit very well. They come already laced up (Some shoes don't) and the quality is as expected of DC shoes. I wish i only could of seen a more detailed view of the shoes pattern. Not a big fan of the worn skull teeth pattern. Though it was more like a snake skin texture print. But you can only tell the pattern is worn skull teeth up close. Still good shoes regardless and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In the picture they look really good, in reality they are great
customer_reviews.text: In the picture they look really good, in reality they are great, is just that they are like the classic skater shoes that are really thick, so the shoe looks bigger than its actual size (they fit great is just all this extra stuff inside), so for example using the skinny pants looks even bigger than other shoes. A lot of shoes now, even the skater ones, are thinner and they are really close to the foot shape. However these are good shoes, comfortable and with the usual good quality of DC
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Marta

customer_reviews.title: DC* For Life 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They look great and showed up in excellent condition. Excellent product, Fast shipping, all around great service. A++++ 2 thumbs up 👍🏻👍🏻 Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richie Lance

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: I believe they wouldn't be tight once really broken in. There is a large pad that your tendon sits against and not much give pushing the sneakers back so your toes are jammed up front. Comfy though in my spare time.
customer_reviews.author: James R Hemond

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoes that fits just as expected. I have larger feet making it hard to find shoes my size in stock and then when in stock, ones that fit properly. These were both. Great show, looks nice, feels great and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Sumsion

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and he says they are the most comfortable sneakers he has ever had. They came quickly and were packed great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! He has been looking for his perfect pair for a while now and he finally found them in these.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mom Blog

customer_reviews.title: wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the court graffik with white battleship design for a couple of years. I walk the heck out of them, and they only hold up for about 2.5 to 3 months. I will be trying another shoe solution next because they wear out too quickly. Plus, it is hard to find the ones that fit me. I wear a D width, and they seem to be sold out often.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Schomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these in a 6.5 ( 8.5 in womens) for my 9 yr old daughter ( shes EXTREMELY tall) they fit perfectly shes got alittle wiggle room to grow and they look amazing! Very happy with our purchase I'll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With DC Shoes
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with DC shoes. They are a wide, comfortable fit even for larger feet. The fact they go up to such larger sizes makes me buy them again and again. The wear is pretty normal, considering they are worn constantly, including at work. Will definitely keep purchasing DC shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous332Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit amazingly and was very comfortable. I've been wearing DC shoes most of my life and they are always very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: The Dreadbug

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and extremely comfortable shoes. For years if I've found a pair of shoes I can see myself wearing I'd buy two pairs because it'd take years to find something else I could stand to wear. I've gotten these and tried a few other pairs of DCs recently and I've bought more shoes this year than I've bought in the last 6 because they're all comfortable and look great. Even seems to support my ankle well which has been surgically repaired twice and tends to roll for no reason. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brad_PGH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These DC shoes are so dang sharp. They work with casual, semi casual or just everyday wear. I love the work boot color. They fit perfect in length, width and arch support. Wore them all day while walking around a mall, flea market and other stores throughout an entire day and no issues. You can't beat the price either for name brand skate shoes. Will certainly buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you expected. If you’ve worn one pair of authentic DC skate shoes you’ve worn them all. Comfortable, stylish And perfect for your foot and skate needs.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hadder

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg
customer_reviews.text: DC's are made in Korea. Good knock offs are made in Vietnam. These garbage shoes are made in China. Horrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: great colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors. I was a little afraid the colors wouldn't be the same as the pictures but they are great.
customer_reviews.author: K and J Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cheap
customer_reviews.text: If you buy DC's, these are what you'd expect. Like walking on clouds, in perfect condition, fit perfectly no damage no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Love this pair of DC's
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this style for awhile now and is nice to be able to order online and have them come just like I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: jeff privett

customer_reviews.title: Best DC shoe ever made!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only model/brand shoe my husband wears. He has fat feet, and these are great! He has work shoes, dress shoes, and street shoes, and they’re ALL court graffik DC’s! He absolutely loves this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Had to rock these..
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured. I'm use to thin tongues in shoes. So the thicker tongue took a lil getting use to but I love them and the look. I wear a 7.5 in women's and bought a size 6. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MedalChic

customer_reviews.title: High pressure from puffy tongue
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of pressure on the tops of your feet from the poofy tongue. My feet lost alot of blood circulation due to most of the big blood veins being in top of feet. So my feet feel almost numb now and are painful to touch. The shoelaces are very short. Since the tongues are very puffy, you'll have to loosen the laces to help with the comfort. To sum these shoes up, I would compare these shoes to having your feet wrapped in soft pillows, but then wrapping duct tape very tightly around your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: compliments every time I wear them. Seem to be made well. I like
customer_reviews.author: Allyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Got them yesterday and tried them out today and they feel amazing. I am a huge DC person and these are by far one of the most comfortable pair I've owned. They fit my feet perfectly so definitely true to size...not to mention they are definitely cool to look at. Definitely would recommend and i would buy them again and in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, could use some more patterns available
customer_reviews.text: Fits my size 12 E width foot perfect. Very comfy and fits just right for me. Best trick shoes I have ever had. A wider variety of patterns would be nice though.
customer_reviews.author: shane-0

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and was received fast and they were exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Neil Eisenwasser

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I ever wore.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear DC shoes because it so comfortable for ppl who have wide feet. Also its stylish.
customer_reviews.author: David Chon

customer_reviews.title: They fit exact size not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these shoes are very supportive and fit well and look great
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williams

customer_reviews.title: BEST DC SHOE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fabulous! I have gotten lots of compliments on these shoes....LOVE THEM SO MUCH 🥰💯
customer_reviews.author: Jenn49880

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love DC shoes, I wear a 14 in tennis shoes generally but in the court graffiks I have to order a 15. Other DC's I can get away with a 14, I guess it depends on where they are made. You can't beat the quality of the shoe, I'm not a skater so I wear them casually, can't comment on durability. Overall great shoe for 3 to 6 hours of daily wear. May need to order a size up from your dress shoe size, good luck!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size bigger. Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Order one size bigger and they fit great. Super comfy. Not sure how long they will last. I wear these on weekends only and my cat work boots all week. With my tired feet these help make them feel so much better than walking around on my hard wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Donohue

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES them! The men in my house only wear DC and these are true DC, true to size, super comfortable, and real smooth looking. I’ve got super tough guys and these have held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality product. If you wear it every day expect it to only last about a year. Personally I only wear these about once or twice a week so they'll last a bit longer than that. I had my previous pair for about three years.
customer_reviews.author: BankAfterDark

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Milwaukee boot that we've ordered for my husband, the last pair survived more than 5 years of hard working use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crushed box.
customer_reviews.text: They came on time, when I opened the product, the shoe box was ripped and crushed... The sad part is I bought these as a gift... And I'm going to have to give them a ripped up shoe box.. The shoes look great though.. They are very handsome looking shoes, I don't suppose it's DC shoes fault that the box came crushed... It's probably had a hard time at the Amazon warehouse.. All and all I give it three stars. Hope that's this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Great pair as always.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE DC shoes, and these are amazing. I wear these pretty much all day and it is like pillows are around my feet, while still being supportive. I use them both for work and when I am off the job, they are easy to clean when I need to clean them and just all around feel amazing. I usually put 3rd party insoles in them to keep the moisture and smell down, but that is all I do to these.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a DC fan and loves them. But then again, he has like 10 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe it looks good and fits well DC has always made a good shoe in my opinion I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher j Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice looking shoe, fits snug but not uncomfortable. Well padded on top. Been using DC shoes a couple of years now and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DavidP

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, very comfortable. Got what I expected with DC
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early. Was NOT packaged very well. It was open, the box was smashed. They are little small compared to other DC shoes even the same style.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E

customer_reviews.title: Stylish shoes, attractive price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome shoes overall. Fit as expected and a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: ELO

customer_reviews.title: shoe
customer_reviews.text: they came in white, now they're dirty. i'll just have to buy another pair. one side had some tape residue or something i could not get off, other that that everything as described
customer_reviews.author: TeDDY

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of cushion on the tongue & inside shoe. Shoe laces are the thicker style laces.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: i got 2 pairs of these to wear to work, i hate the color and the design on this perticular pair but the price was right and like i said i got them to wear to work. i always wear DC or Etnies, a pair of either brand has always last me several years. the ones i weat to work dont usually last that long but the ones i wear around town do. my job is hard on shoes. i am quite happy with this shoe, good quality, tey fitt perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: daniel  caldwell

customer_reviews.title: DC the best always
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, amazing, amazing... quality, price, look, durable, confort..., is still being the best brand on market. DCan I s 10/10, Amazon 10/10. what else can I say? just thank U!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fabián

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely comfy
customer_reviews.text: Having high arches, these are the best shoes I've ever used to longboard. Excellent quality for a pretty fair price. Ima keep buying them until my feet fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Always a great shoe. Probably my sixth pair over the last several years
customer_reviews.author: christopher davis

customer_reviews.title: All shoes are a little tight at first until you work them in
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new job and so I use these as work shoes because they look so clean and that they are black. So far my experience has been great oh, we're a little tight at first but have adjusted and worked out beautifully. Y'all should start thinking about sending out two different color shoe strings because I can't find a red fat laces anywhere
customer_reviews.author: bakedbrockly

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Have brought several other pairs of DC shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Williams

customer_reviews.title: i love my DCs
customer_reviews.text: these are the only shoes ive ever worn since highschool and theyre what I'll wear til im too old to have a choice
customer_reviews.author: Trevor F.

customer_reviews.title: they were a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of them they're great fit they're really comfortable they have support and I would buy them again thank you
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it! Rocks it at school! Will buy from you again
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: ... dad for Christmas he loves the shoes as they're comfortable in his feet prevent sore back from difficult shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dad for Christmas he loves the shoes as they're comfortable in his feet prevent sore back from difficult shoes a last long time and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes almost a year ago for my son they're still in fabulous condition
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Gog lots of compliments. I like the camo color scheme. Great for ppl with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: J.Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Not wide at all
customer_reviews.text: This was miss advertised they were not wide at all couldn't even get my feet in them and they are the size I always wear
customer_reviews.author: Skylinegtr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little bit small at first but after breaking them in they’re fine
customer_reviews.author: YM

customer_reviews.title: small dc came off toe in one week.... other than that... all good....
customer_reviews.text: love dc shoes.. but the small dc came off toe in one week......
customer_reviews.author: XxDocHollidayxx

customer_reviews.title: DC Den's Court Graffik SE Fashion Sneaker,Fluorescent Lime COOL SHOES AT A COOL PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PAIR OF SHOES! The color on the side is so fashionable and the fit is comfortable to my feet. I usually order a 1/2 size bigger to wear with thick socks. Also the rubber soles are thick and cushiony. I am just waiting for our Chicago weather to improve to start wearing these shoes outside. I mean, I like them so much I do not want to ruin them in the snow, guess I'll have to wait for spring time!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPYWOLF

customer_reviews.title: DC Shoes are the best
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 now and I have not skateboarded everyday since I was 20. I don't know if it is because I grew up in these type of shoes or what but I just don't understand why people buy Jordans or Nikes. They are ugly and not that comfortable and they are always "SKINNY" as I call them. DC comes out with great designs and colors and I just stick with what works and what looks good on the street.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Svaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big guys!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy I can take them off and on. Perfect fit and cushion. Very comfortable. And I'm a size 17 at 6ft8 405lbs! Definitely a big man shoe lol
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Davis Jr

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, they grey DC logo really sets these shoes off.
customer_reviews.author: bye bye

customer_reviews.title: Go 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Way too small! Order at least a size up. Quality was sub par for the price and I'll be returning for a refund immediately after how long they took to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Rohrs

customer_reviews.title: These are white!
customer_reviews.text: It can't really get any whiter than these. Hard to keep them clean ofcourse but great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: These skater shoes are very comfortable, and seem to be very well made. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Definitely was disappointed on no original packaging
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy that they did not show up in original box and noticed there was a little bit of damage on the shoes after inspection but I did order them for the specific purpose and I had to use them so. This is the only kind of shoe that I actually wear for pleasure I would rate the shoe a five but I'm not too sure where the damage occurred to shipping if it was already damaged before they ship them out or if it was during transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wear from these
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this classic has been, is now and hopefully will be exactly the same cut, padding and fit ithas been for at least the last 15+ years I have enjoyed wearing them and showing my support of the sport
customer_reviews.author: BIGOKIE

customer_reviews.title: Dmamaged box
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged, I was planning on giving it as a gift. Product returned. 2 stats just because it arrived quickly and was the right product
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: To small... same style and size as the last ones I got for my son, just a different color but these were too tight and a bit short. Looked nice and well made.
customer_reviews.author: mom2-10

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Graphics are nice. True black color. Sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: School Shoe Fits the Bill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my son to wear to school. He finds them to fit well, and to be a comfortable wear during his school day. However, approximately two weeks after purchasing the shoes, my son caught the laces on something which caused them to undo and fray. I had to purchase new laces. But, boys will be boys, so this is not necessarily a negative on the product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kasela

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair of these prior to this purchase and they are great shoes! Had to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Only shoe my husband wares
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and I buy him a new pair every couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Czekalski

customer_reviews.title: They look slick but Adidas are definitely more comfortable and a little cheaper/same price
customer_reviews.text: 5 for shipping! & description. Slightly big. I guess it depends who you are but the shoes seem to have a lot of space in the toe section. I always need wide shoes so its normal there. If you pull the strings tight, that doesn't change the toe space. They look slick but Adidas are definitely more comfortable and a little cheaper/same price. Obviously doesn't look the same. Anyway, hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: DC Men's Court Graffik Se Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Special features include: lightweight mesh tongue with foam padded tongue and collar for comfort and support
